scripts.soft-clean: node clean.js plugins && node clean.js platforms
scripts.apply:ewallet-debug: node apply.js ewallet && npm run run:prepare-debug
scripts.apply:ewallet-prod: node apply.js ewallet && npm run run:prepare-prod
scripts.apply:ewallet-build-debug: node apply.js ewallet && npm run run:build-debug
scripts.apply:ewallet-build-release: node apply.js ewallet && npm run run:build-release
scripts.apply:default-debug: node apply.js default && npm run run:prepare-debug
scripts.apply:default-prod: node apply.js default && npm run run:prepare-prod
scripts.apply:default-build-debug: node apply.js default && npm run run:build-debug
scripts.apply:default-build-release: node apply.js default && npm run run:build-release
scripts.run:prepare-debug: cd ..  && ionic cordova prepare android && ionic cordova prepare ios && cd app_build_helper
scripts.run:prepare-prod: cd .. && ionic cordova prepare android --prod && ionic cordova prepare ios --prod && cd app_build_helper
scripts.run:build-debug: cd ..  && ionic cordova build android && ionic cordova build ios && cd app_build_helper
scripts.run:build-release: cd .. && ionic cordova build android --prod --release && ionic cordova build ios --prod --release && cd app_build_helper
scripts.reset:ewallet-debug: npm run clean && npm run apply:ewallet-config && cd .. && npm install && ionic cordova platform add browser && ionic cordova platform add android && ionic cordova platform add ios && ionic cordova prepare && cd app_build_helper && npm run apply:ewallet-debug
scripts.reset:ewallet-release: npm run clean && npm run apply:ewallet-config && cd .. && npm install && ionic cordova platform add browser && ionic cordova platform add android && ionic cordova platform add ios && ionic cordova prepare && cd app_build_helper && npm run apply:ewallet-prod
scripts.reset:default-debug: npm run clean && npm run apply:default-config && cd .. && npm install && ionic cordova platform add browser && ionic cordova platform add android && ionic cordova platform add ios && ionic cordova prepare && cd app_build_helper && npm run apply:default-debug
scripts.reset:default-release: npm run clean && npm run apply:default-config && cd .. && npm install && ionic cordova platform add browser && ionic cordova platform add android && ionic cordova platform add ios && ionic cordova prepare && cd app_build_helper && npm run apply:default-prod
